title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, there is an issue with the 'Close All Saved' functionality. It does not work consistently.
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu after creating a new file f1.txt, the expected behavior is that all opened files that have been saved should be closed.
EB: However, the actual behavior is that not all saved files are being closed when 'Close All Saved' is selected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
